description: Another big upgrade for Steam desktop and Steam Deck fans, with Game Recording now in Beta allowing you to easily clip your favourite moments with no external apps needed.
title: Steam Game Recording Beta announced - works on Linux and Steam Deck too

description: HORI, a manufacturer of popular gaming accessories have today revealed the Wireless Horipad for Steam. So if you're in need of a gamepad, this might be for you.
title: HORI announced a special gamepad for Steam / Steam Deck

description: System76 are making a bit of a splash today, ahead of the Alpha release of their new desktop environment named COSMIC.
title: COSMIC Alpha coming in July - System76 reveal branding, a big hardware sale with new merch

description: Need some more games for a Steam Deck, another handheld or for desktop Linux? Fanatical have the Handheld Heroes Bundle available now.
title: Fanatical's Handheld Heroes Bundle has another selection for Steam Deck

description: Dawnfolk (previously called Lueur and the Dim Settlers) is a very promising minimalist survival city-builder, one that suckered me in with the various mini-games in every tile you build and it's looking great.
title: Lueur and the Dim Settlers renamed Dawnfolk, new trailer shows off accessibility features

description: While Valve didn't really do anything to mark the 25th anniversary of Counter-Strike 2, they have at least put out another small update that brings in the first community maps for CS2.
title: Valve adds the first community maps into Counter-Strike 2

description: Atari continue their mini-spree of buying up games and studios, with their relaunched Infogrames label acquiring the Surgeon Simulator franchise.
title: Infogrames (Atari) have acquired the Surgeon Simulator franchise

description: Neon Rider Classic is the new and improved definitive collection of classic Flash games, Neon Rider and Neon Rider World, which were played more than 15 million times and now it's on Steam.
title: Classic flash game Neon Rider returns on Steam with Neon Rider Classic

description: A couple of smaller updates for both Steam Deck and Desktop Linux to go over today, as Valve keep pushing towards the next stable update.
title: SteamOS 3.6.7 Preview for Steam Deck released, plus more Steam Beta Client updates for all

description: A nice little win for preserving the classics. GOG teamed up with Capcom to bring Resident Evil, Resident Evil 2 and Resident Evil 3 to their store with a few improvements.
title: GOG revives the original Resident Evil, plus Resident Evil 2 and Resident Evil 3 on the way
